subject: College Athletics

Amateur Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Two years after a college baseball player was suspended for letting an agent close a deal for him, players and coaches are no closer to understanding the rules.
snippet: Two years after a college baseball player was suspended for letting an agent close a deal for him, players and coaches are no closer to understanding the rules.
